languages.text: С каждым словом собравшиеся вокруг койки люди все больше распрямляют спины, а их взгляды наполняются восхищением и верой. Отсалютовав, офицеры с полными уверенности лицами покидают медпалубу, чтобы исполнить свой долг.

traits.locale_text: Раненые одобрительно свистят и салютуют Лорду-капитану. А офицеры, отдав честь, с полными уверенности лицами покидают медпалубу.

languages.text: With each word, the people around the bed straighten up, and their gazes are filled with awe and faith. The officers salute the Lord Captain and leave the medicae deck in complete confidence, ready to do their duty.
languages.original_text: С каждым словом собравшиеся вокруг койки люди все больше распрямляют спины, а их взгляды наполняются восхищением и верой. Отсалютовав, офицеры с полными уверенности лицами покидают медпалубу, чтобы исполнить свой долг.

languages.text: Con cada palabra, la gente que rodea la cama se endereza y sus miradas se llenan de asombro y fe. Los oficiales saludan a su L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y abandonan la cubierta médica en silencio, dirigiéndose a cumplir su deber.
languages.original_text: With each word, the people around the bed straighten up, and their gazes are filled with awe and faith. The officers salute the Lord Captain and leave the medicae deck in complete confidence, ready to do their duty.

traits.locale_text: Con cada palabra, la gente que rodea la cama se endereza y sus miradas se llenan de asombro y fe. Los oficiales saludan a su L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y abandonan la cubierta médica en silencio, dirigiéndose a cumplir su deber.

languages.text: 领主舰长每说一句话，床边军官们的身型便挺起了一分，目光中充满了敬畏与信念。到最后，军官们向领主舰长敬了个礼，满怀信心地离开了医疗甲板，准备履行各自的职责。
languages.original_text: With each word, the people around the bed straighten up, and their gazes are filled with awe and faith. The officers salute the Lord Captain and leave the medicae deck in complete confidence, ready to do their duty.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长每说一句话，床边军官们的身型便挺起了一分，目光中充满了敬畏与信念。到最后，军官们向领主舰长敬了个礼，满怀信心地离开了医疗甲板，准备履行各自的职责。

languages.text: 言葉を発するたびに、ベッドの周りにいる人間は背筋を伸ばし、その視線は畏怖と忠誠に満ちている。士官達はロード・キャプテンに敬礼し、任務を遂行する準備を整えて、自信に満ちた様子でメディケアデッキを後にした。
languages.original_text: With each word, the people around the bed straighten up, and their gazes are filled with awe and faith. The officers salute the Lord Captain and leave the medicae deck in complete confidence, ready to do their duty.

traits.locale_text: 言葉を発するたびに、ベッドの周りにいる人間は背筋を伸ばし、その視線は畏怖と忠誠に満ちている。士官達はロード・キャプテンに敬礼し、任務を遂行する準備を整えて、自信に満ちた様子でメディケアデッキを後にした。

languages.text: Bei jedem Wort richten sich die Menschen um das Bett auf, und ihre Blicke sind von Ehrfurcht und Vertrauen erfüllt. Die Offiziere grüßen den Lord Captain und verlassen das Medicae-Deck in vollem Vertrauen, bereit, ihre Pflicht zu erfüllen.
languages.original_text: With each word, the people around the bed straighten up, and their gazes are filled with awe and faith. The officers salute the Lord Captain and leave the medicae deck in complete confidence, ready to do their duty.

languages.text: À chacun de ses mots, les officiers rassemblés autour du lit se redressent, tandis que leur regard s'emplit d'admiration et de confiance. Une fois le discours terminé, ils saluent {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et quittent le pont medicae avec la certitude qu'ils accompliront leur devoir.
languages.original_text: With each word, the people around the bed straighten up, and their gazes are filled with awe and faith. The officers salute the Lord Captain and leave the medicae deck in complete confidence, ready to do their duty.

traits.locale_text: À chacun de ses mots, les officiers rassemblés autour du lit se redressent, tandis que leur regard s'emplit d'admiration et de confiance. Une fois le discours terminé, ils saluent {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et quittent le pont medicae avec la certitude qu'ils accompliront leur devoir.

languages.text: Her sözüyle yatağın etrafındaki insanlar daha bir doğruluyor, bakışları daha bir huşu ve inançla doluyor. Subaylar, Lord Kaptan'ı selamlayarak görevlerini yapmaya hazır hâlde, müthiş bir güvenle sıhhiye güvertesinden ayrılıyor.
languages.original_text: With each word, the people around the bed straighten up, and their gazes are filled with awe and faith. The officers salute the Lord Captain and leave the medicae deck in complete confidence, ready to do their duty.

traits.locale_text: Her sözüyle yatağın etrafındaki insanlar daha bir doğruluyor, bakışları daha bir huşu ve inançla doluyor. Subaylar, Lord Kaptan'ı selamlayarak sıhhiye güvertesinden görevlerini yapmaya hazır bir şekilde müthiş bir güvenle ayrılıyor.
